    • Constructor Detail

      • GameOption

        public GameOption(int playerNumber,
                  GameMode gameMode,
                  String language)
           throws RuntimeException
        this constructor is the same as GameOption(playerNumber,gameMode,language,false)
        Parameters:
        playerNumber - Number of player (1,2,4)
        gameMode - game mode (SinglePlayer,MultiPlayerRace,MultiCoop,MultiCoopRace)
        language - language of the game
        Throws:
        RuntimeException - can throw RuntimeException if the parameters are not compatible.Exemple: 2 player with the SinglePlayer GameMode will throw an Exception

      • GameOption

        public GameOption(int playerNumber,
                  GameMode gameMode,
                  String language,
                  boolean dualScreen)
           throws RuntimeException
        Parameters:
        playerNumber - Number of player (1,2,4)
        gameMode - game mode (SinglePlayer,MultiPlayerRace,MultiCoop,MultiCoopRace)
        language - language of the game
        dualScreen - a boolean value which tell if the game will be split on 2 JFrame (Only 2 or 4 Player)
        Throws:
        RuntimeException - can throw RuntimeException if the parameters are not compatible.Exemple: 2 player with the SinglePlayer GameMode will throw an Exception
